name: Goblin
description: Goblins are small, quick-witted humanoids that have built one of the most spectaculur and advanced societies on Atlah. Goblins are typically born with a more purple hue, but turn green in their later years due to their civilization being built on the dark side of the moon where the green glow of Viridus is always directly overhead. The goblin love of creating has created a culture of meritocracy where those in power are the best crafters.

options.name: Small
options.description: Goblins are small creatures. All of your finesse skills are upgraded and your physique skills downgraded. You also have a -1 penalty to movement speed.

options.name: Nimble Hands
options.description: Goblin fingers are incredibly nimble, capable of complex and accurate movements. Gain +1 skill with coordination and +1 skill with engineering.

options.name: Reaction : Flexible Bones
options.description: Goblin bones are incredibly flexible and rarely break. In response to taking damage from being shoved or falling, halve the damage.

options.name: Quick Metabolism
options.description: Goblins have a very active metabolism, causing them to process chemicals and food much faster than normal. Despite being small, you require as much food as a medium sized creature. Additionally, damage or healing effects from potions or poisons are doubled against you and the length of all potions and elixirs you drink is halved.
